content: I think I'll definitely check out some of those luxury brands you mentioned, especially Byredo and Diptyque. I've heard great things about them and I'm curious to see if they have any scents that are similar to my Tom Ford perfume. Do you think I should also consider looking at niche brands or smaller, independent perfume houses? I've heard that they can offer really unique and high-quality fragrances at a lower price point than some of the more established luxury brands.
